page.title: 01Darras Hall and Medburn
page.content: Just over half of our block is farmland,owned by 5 different farmers. A public footpath crosses the fields between{Darras Hall and Medburn. } The dominant residential area is the executive housing on the{Darras {Hall Estate.}Our 2 schools, which draw from this catchment area,are in this block.{Medburn}is a small,rural hamlet comprising only 30 dwellings. A comprehensive shopping parade of 14 units is opposite the schools. Nearby is a modern{Presbyterian church and an old wooden Railway Station Building.Two market gardens are still in business,many others having been sold to developers for residential properties.{Public open spaces}include {Ponteland Park,Old Railway Line path {and the Recreation Field,}known as "The Flush".
